1.7.name: wordpress/weaver
1.7.description: This version on Weaver is essentially OBSOLETE. Now, a new, even better version, called Weaver II, is available. Weaver II has many new features, including second-to-none automatic mobile device support. The new version is available right here at http://wordpress.org/extend/themes/weaver-ii, or you can get more information at http://weavertheme.com. For a long time Weaver 2.2.x has been one of the highest rated themes on WordPress.org. This version will remain available until the next major version of WP (probably 3.5), but, we highly recommend that you use Weaver II rather than Weaver 2.2.x. Thank you.
